summary: 129 clinical samples were the intestinal tissue of piglets with severe diarrhea, from 17 cities in central china. both the spike (S) glycoprotein (S1, 1–789 amino acids (aa)) and the full-length ORF3 gene of 21 representative field strains from 21 farms in 11 cities were sequenced and analysed. position 375 and 1-aa deletion at position 430 compared to CV777 attenuated strain. these mutations were located on the receptor binding domain.
